title: Ambient Video Game Music - Night Forest 2
description: Return to the enchanting quietude of the nocturnal woods with the highly anticipated sequel to our collection of night-time forest ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Return to the enchanting quietude of the nocturnal woods with the highly anticipated sequel to our collection of night-time forest ambience tracks. This new set of 10 tracks dives even deeper into the serene mystery of the forest at night, providing game developers with a more intricate and nuanced soundscape that captures the essence of nature after dark.


Each pack in this sequel brings the listener closer to the forest's night-time melodies. The cricket chorus is more detailed, with each chirp captured in high fidelity to immerse players in the forest's nocturnal symphony. Amplifying this auditory experience are the sounds of nocturnal creatures that come alive with greater clarity and diversity, adding an extra layer of depth to the mysterious atmosphere.


Enhancing the immersion are packs that feature the soft patter of rain falling through the forest canopy. These sounds are captured with more precision, replicating the gentle rhythms of rainfall and the freshness of a rain-soaked forest, further deepening the sensory experience.


This sequel is a must-have for game developers seeking to enrich their nocturnal forest environments. The enhanced sounds of the crickets, nocturnal creatures, rain, and unifying track promise to transport players deeper into the heart of the night-time forest. The rich auditory experience will resonate with players, making them feel as if they are truly exploring a serene and mysterious forest under the starlit sky.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
